description:
Want to have more entertainment watching soccer (football for my non-US friends).  Use this app to add a little betting on the line as you watch.  I use a bowl of candy with my kids...and a little wager with the guys.  Whatever you choose is fine.
The coolest part of this app is that it syncs multiple phones.  Your HP/Palm Pre and iPhone friends can join the game.  Any number of your friends can join the same game.  You'll be playing together real-time...whether in the same room or across the world.  The winning is simply chance.  If you happen to have the right picture at the right time when either soccer team scores or a player received a penalty card, you win!  Buy the app and read the instructions to get more detail on how this works!!

If you like US football, then try the "Football Fan Fun" version.
versionNote:
v1.9.0
 - Added increased reliability and accuracy with syncing across phones.
